title: ABOUT
content: FOOD is a creative consultancy. If you are a brand, business or instutition that needs help with a creative project maybe we can help? Email creds@food.xyz to get a copy of our creds deck.

title: HOW WE WORK
content: We are up for anything. As long as it's decent. We work in various ways, but we prefer high-collaboration, high-trust relationships. We like making new things. Or looking at old things in new ways.
